amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Diplomatic and Consular Programs by $1.2 billion; Operating Expenses for USAID by $330 million; and Global Health by $670 million, reflecting FY 2009 enacted funding levels.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 111-193 to reduce funding for: Diplomatic and Consular Programs by $1.2 billion; Operating Expenses for USAID by $330 million; and Global Health by $670 million. This would reflect FY2009 enacted funding levels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Buyer amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 271 (Roll no. 517).
